location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson, Commanding in Rasselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah]

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledges the receipt of Captain Thomas Perronet Thompson's letter of 11 March 1820, in which Thompson requested water supplies for the garrison station under his command. Bruce promises to send a set of coopers - with casks and kegs - on board the Honourable Company's bugulah [buggalow], the Dolphin.Bruce states that he will also try to get the Commander of the country ship Liverpoolto deliver its casks to Rasselkhyma [Ra's al-Khaymah].
